fullDescription.intro: The ComBase database provides sets of data about growth / survival / inactivation of different organisms (mostly bacteria) in various food matrices. Microbial data with time series (log10(cfu/g) over time (hours)) and D values can be exported to CSV files. The ComBase Reader is a CSV reader parsing the semistructured spreadsheet file and providing microbial data in a structured way so that they can be used for predictive microbial modelling in PMM-Lab.
fullDescription.option: Select a ComBase CSV file downloaded from www.combase.cc
